references: P. Hoffman, Archimedes' Revenge, Penguin Books 1988, pp. 39-40.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Select[Table[3 n^2 - 3 n + 23, {n, 60}], PrimeQ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 20 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [a: n in [1..60] | IsPrime(a) where a is 3*n^2-3*n+23]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 20 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
